home.title: Home
home.description: Central operating system for small and medium businesses

hero.title: No longer face diabetes alone. We can support you.
hero.description: Stressed or concerned about how to manage diabetes? Have no fear, Lifely is here to help you. Be part of a new type of platform that harnesses the power of mentoring and technology to help you confidently tackle diabetes.

feature.heading: What is Lifely?
feature.description: Lifely is a brand new platform that can connect you with a skilled and knowledgeable mentor who is trained to help you overcome the hurdles of living with diabetes.
feature.card_members_description: Anyone who is living with diabetes can join Lifely. We pair you with a mentor who uniquely understands you and helps you conquer your hurdles
feature.card_members_button: See how we help our members
feature.card_mentors_description: If you've faced a hurdle in your life with diabetes and want to help others, we want you to make life better for our members. And we'll pay you, too.

how_it_works.heading: How does Lifely work?
how_it_works.description: Our platform works seamlessly to make it easy for you to get the support you need.
how_it_works.step1_description: It takes a few steps to sign up. After you sign up, you'll be asked to create an account.
how_it_works.step2_description: After just a few questions, we will present you with a few mentors who are uniquely ready to help you
how_it_works.step3_description: Meet with your mentor online at your own pace. As you work together, our platform helps you improve and grow stronger with your mentor

members.title: Feel supported with Lifely
members.description: Join as a member and get support from a mentor who understands life with diabetes.

hero.title: Make diabetes manageable—together
hero.description: Join as a member and pair with a mentor who's walked your path. Use Lifely to meet with your mentor, manage medications, log your day, and celebrate wins—big and small.

feature62.heading: Lifely turns stress into a trusted, simple plan
feature62.description: Feeling overwhelmed is normal, but Lifely is here to help! We match you with a mentor who's walked this path and helps you set small, doable goals. Our mentors work with you to create a plan that works for you, but also creates much more:

items.title: Talk to someone who's been there
items.description: Our mentors understand the unique challenges that come with living with diabetes. Whether you are looking for emotional, practical, or day-to-day support, our mentors can help.

items.title: Your judgment-free space
items.description: In addition to living with diabetes, all Lifely mentors are expertly trained to create the space you need to be your best. They create safe conversations that normalize fears, frustration, and "is this normal?" moments.

items.title: Move at your pace
items.description: You'll work with your mentor to set bite-size goals (sleep, meals, movement, medications) that matter to you. Your mentor and our tools will help you move at a speed you're comfortable with to build confidence over time.

feature170.heading: Our tools turn daily care into doable steps
feature170.description: We give all our members a private, all-in-one toolkit—paired with a mentor who's been there—so managing diabetes feels clear and manageable every day.

cards.title: Setting and meeting your goals
cards.description: We want to help you reach your health goals. On your terms. That's why our platform has:

bullets.text: curated to help you create bite-size goals that you can feel confident in meeting
to keep you going in the right direction
with your mentor to deepen your connection and make further progress on your goals

cards.title: Tools that make the journey easier
cards.description: Everyone can use a little help. That's why we included helpful tools to support your goals:

bullets.text: to help remind you to remember the tiny things that lead to healthy habits
to help you capture your thoughts, stay in sync with yourself, and help you uncover unknown barriers to progress

cards.title: Feel supported by our technology
cards.description: We have carefully designed our platform with the latest advancements in technology to support you on your journey:

bullets.text: provides a clear, simplified view of your journey to help you monitor progress and celebrate wins and find what needs adjusting
provide clear summaries and next steps after each time you meet with your mentor

feature183.heading: How do you get started with Lifely?
feature183.description: Excited to get moving towards your health goals with a Lifely mentor? We are getting ready for our initial, private launch and would love to have you.
feature183.subtitle: Sign up for our waitlist now
feature183.subtitleDescription: Once you're in, it's just a few steps to get up and going with Lifely.

steps.title: Tell us about you
steps.description: Share a little about yourself so we understand your goals and preferences.

steps.title: Find your mentor
steps.description: You'll choose your mentor—someone who's been there and understands your day-to-day.

steps.title: Work on your goals
steps.description: Set your goals, and meet with your mentor to help motivate you to meet them. Our tools can also help you see progress add up quickly.

mentors.title: Lifely for Mentors
mentors.description: Join as a mentor and help others live better with diabetes.

hero.title: Mentors are the heart of our community
hero.description: Have you had experience with diabetes? Want to help others take on the disease with what you know, and make a real impact? Then join Lifely as a mentor to help others live their best lives.

feature62.heading: Become a truly special person to those who need help
feature62.description: Our mentors help our members make sense of diabetes, and put the control back to them (not the disease). With your unique lived experience and steady encouragement, you can turn fear and confusion into clarity, small wins, and momentum—that lasts for life.

items.title: Listen. Understand. And help.
items.description: You get to help someone be in the driver's seat of their health. Share your stories and tactics of how you cope, live, and thrive—through the good days and the bad ones, too. By mentoring someone, you'll listen, understand, and help people not feel ashamed of what is happening.

items.title: Become an anchor in care
items.description: Your experience in managing diabetes can help someone understand what to do in their care. No understanding of medical jargon is needed. Rather, you can translate how daily changes in the disease can be responded to in a human, culturally-appropriate way.

items.title: And become better while you're at it
items.description: All Lifely mentors get the good feeling of helping others. But what else? You'll get access to our exclusive training library to become a better listener, coach, and person. And you may earn some money along the way, too.

feature170.heading: Our tools make it simple to focus on your mentees
feature170.description: Every mentor has access to our custom-built toolkit for focusing on our mentees.

cards.title: Fast and easy communication
cards.description: We want to minimize any barriers you have in meeting with your mentees:

bullets.text: help you schedule and meet with your mentees at ease, yet pushed to be their best
to make it easy to find a time that works
to deepen your connection and make further progress

cards.title: Analytics to help you find insights
cards.description: Sometimes it's tough to see the big picture. Our analytics can help you:

bullets.text: on how mentees are doing in and out of meetings to help you ask the right questions
in the physical and emotional health of your mentees
for goals and actions you and your mentee should take in between sessions

cards.title: AI assistance to bring out your best
cards.description: Our intelligence has been designed to help bring out your best and allow you to focus on providing support:

bullets.text: that you can ask questions, prepare for upcoming sessions, recall previous information, and offload simple tasks to if you're busy
presents you with a quick, accurate rollup so you don't have to remember every detail yourself, especially in back-to-back sessions

feature183.heading: How do you get started with Lifely?
feature183.description: Excited to help others, give back, and get paid? Lifely would love to have you in our private launch.
feature183.subtitle: Sign up for our waitlist now
feature183.subtitleDescription: Once you're in, it's just a few steps to get up and going with Lifely.

steps.title: Tell us about you
steps.description: Share a little about yourself so we understand your goals and preferences.

steps.title: Get set up
steps.description: Answer a few questions and take a couple quick courses to become eligible to set up sessions.

steps.title: Meet. And earn.
steps.description: Once eligible, our technology will begin matching you with people that you can mentor. You'll be paid for your time.
